original_title: Ο Θανάσης, η Ιουλιέττα και τα λουκάνικα
overview: Thanasis (Thanasis Vengos) is an honest working man who has to support his sister’s family as well, as Maria’s husband is only interested in football. Thanasis is in love with Juliet (Aimilia Ypsilanti), daughter of a rough butcher from Mani, who wants to have her marry a sausage-tycoon.
title: Ο Θανάσης, η Ιουλιέττα και τα λουκάνικα
